title.label: Why the need to paste stuff from clipboard when opening app?

content.label: Why does it need access to my clipboard when the app starts?  Get the notification it pasted from what I had copied any time I open it.

title.label: Very balanced and worth your time

content.label: I’ve been playing it on the hardest difficulty and I like how it’s hard but balanced. Overall worth your time and you don’t have to spend money to beat it.
Good
Played on kongregate for years. Love this game, great job developers/testers!

I’ve played all the Kingdom Rush games with the exception of Vengeance, they’re all more or less fun and I wouldn’t rate any of them less than 4 stars. But this one is still the best, I like the towers better, I like the bonus missions better (although Frontiers is a close second in that regard) the enemies are better, the maps and their exclusive abilities are better, basically although this is a fairly old game, it’s arguably one of the best, it’s insanely fun and you can play it offline which is pretty good when you’re travelling.
If you are still in doubt let me tell you, you don’t need to spend a penny to have fun or make progress, it’s always a fun game and feels like a brand new experience every time I start the campaign again. Get it, you won’t regret it.

title.label: amazing game, to many micro transactions

content.label: the game itself is amazing, simple design very addictive, though it is very much so pay to win.
I like it and I have ideas you can control the bad guys in another campaign and online if you ad online like you can be the build the towers and the other player can spawn enimes and this is good.

title.label: Used to be a great game

content.label:
If you’re using this on an iPad or other device that has the correct screen size to display the full playing field - you’re fine. 5 star game. However the narrow display of my iPhone X means I have to scroll the screen to see everything. This basically makes it near impossible to play the game at the highest capability because you can see all the enemies on the field. 

They should have adapted it for screen sizes. Boo. It used to be my favorite tower defense game on my iPad but now on my phone it’s nowhere near as good.
This game is really good
Could you make a all Viking or Dwarf like focus like you did with Origins?

MAN this game is GREAT I love the accessibility it’s a flash game for computer AND it’s on Nintendo switch so if I don’t have my computer somewhere or my phone I can play it on switch ITS A GREAT GAME 10000/10 would recommend :)
My pee is a little red. Is that bad

Kingdom rush is what first got me into gaming at first I had a small gaming channel of 100 subs and I played kingdom rush it was the thing that started everything for me and now I play apex and Minecraft for YouTube and I will always remember kingdom rush
Great game and all but after you defeated vez,on or what ever it gets SUPER hard and thay NEED to add more free heroes.

Fun game. Obviously the game is setup to frustrate the player at certain points in an attempt to get you to make in app purchases. At some point you will either make a purchase to advance or just delete the game as I did.

Why does this game have 5 stars, you ask? Cause it’s the best free game not only on the App Store but darn near anywhere. The hours get sucked away as you watch your little guys fight against other uglier little green guys. Well designed, not a blatant money grab, good difficulty level. Wow- good job

Is it me or when you click casual it puts you on hard? Because when you go onto the sixth one it is impossible I’ve tried everything I’ve restarted on that 100+ times and still I have not won I tried different hero’s still no luck it is trash and if you want better hero’s you have to pay for them that’s stupid it’s pay to win don’t play it and there should be a infinite mode where you see how far you can go but it a is trash if I could go lower than 1 Star I would DONT play it

title.label: Not a pay to win game!

content.label:
For all of you saying this is pay to win game, I think you’re just not good at the game. I literally haven’t spent a dollar on this game and I have 100/130 stars. Use your brain and you can win. Gems are easy to come by, you can watch unlimited ads to get 100 at a time. Stop squashing games and saying they are pay to win when it’s just lack of skills on your end. 

Having said that, the game is fun but I’m not sure why you need to keep collecting stars when you have already maxed out upgrades...

title.label: The game is so awesome but hard but I still love it

content.label: It’s so cool it the best thing
This game is so fun
The platform that this game has is just so good and I will be having so much fun and I can’t wait until I finish the gameplay

This game brings back memories with my mom we used to come up with the ridiculous strategies. The kingdom rush franchise is amazing love the boss fights, animation, heroes and the archer towers. Really do recommend this I hope they will be able to add a multiplayer mode 😎
Awsome spanks
This is a great game, everything is fine and work well. But I will be more happy with monthly update, keep up the good work tho :)

title.label: Great introduction to the TD genre

content.label: I have been a fan of this game for awhile and I’m glad (so far) it hasn’t been a Micro transaction hell, but mostly it just feels like the game I enjoyed playing but with some additional content. Great job Ironhide! :)
👏👏👏 please try this one out it’s a masterpiece for a mobile game

There seems to be a delay when transitioning from executing one action to another. This hinders the ability to respond quick enough sometimes. So I have to double tap to execute my next action.
Game designed around in app purchases. Pure cash grab. Stop supporting these card swipe simulators.

Hi I just have one complaint and that is that Z champions and dark archers are just like standing back and my soldiers can’t reach them so I have to move them around and it’s just kind of annoying. Otherwise I think that the game is perfect. I hope that you might increase the range of attack for the Barricks because otherwise the dark archer is in champions just head back and I have to move my soldiers and heroes so yeah. Thank you

How do you design towers that miss on purpose and try to say it’s a balanced game? Where is this fun? I’ve lost so many times because the enemy is right next to my tower but guess what the little archer man can’t do? Make a shot for his life. 1/10 trash game. Also, the game will literally cheat to make you lose. I place the reinforcements right in front of the enemy near the end and the enemy completely ignores them and just walks off screen. He has a good 3-4 paces to go but no, he just magicallly phases through my knights. Congrats. Never playing this game again

I loved this game but it’s insanely short. Why is there only one stage with like 12 levels? After you beat the final level then a handful more unlock but they are insanely difficult... 

If you get the max 3 stars on every level you only have like 36 stars, but the levels that unlock after beating the first stage (game?) say you need at least 50 stars to compete. Then of course you get trampled easily. Seems like there is a huge gap here.
Dog
This game is excellent. I’ve been playing it for years and never get bored with it. My dad and I absolutely love it (we got it on Nintendo Switch too) and I think it’s one of the best TD games ever!

This game is my favorite tower defense game, ever since i fell in love with it 6 years ago. Satisfying art style, difficult yet rewarding gameplay, and rustic feel. I could not recommend this game enough, I have enjoyed countless hours across all its titles.
